# Membership

## Membership Classes

- Manufacturer Members
- Service Provider Members
- Technology Members
- Fleet / End-User Members
- Individual Contributors
- Academic / Research Members (non-voting if designated)
- Government / Regulatory Liaisons (non-voting)

## Dues

Membership dues and tiers are defined by the Board and published
in a separate Membership Policy.

## Rights & Responsibilities

Members agree to:

- Uphold Foundation codes of conduct
- Participate constructively in working groups
- Support open standards and interoperability

Membership conveys no ownership, equity, or profit rights.
